123.content:
"Tysh ed!" exclaimed rikku

"why wont this stupid machine work??? ERRRRGGHH!!!

"hmm...maybe if i change the matter restrictor and adjust the thingjawawhat then...

"HEY RIKKU!!!" shouted tidus.."whatcha up to"

"CLANG" "ahhhhh....owwwie!!!" rikku rubs her head in fustration....rrrrr what do you want tidus?

"just intrested in what you have been busy doing all this time?"

"hmph....well if you must know I have created a the ultimate weapon (she steps aside revealing a odd looking machine)

with this all our battle problems are solved woo-pie!!!

"I dont understand?" a puzzled tidus added

its simple "giggle" we simply hit this switch and.....

suddenly the room is engulfed in a sea of light as the beam from the machine hits tidus....and all fades to black

when tidus wakes.....
123.title: "It Begins".....

choices: She picks Up tidus lifting him to her ear
Rikku or someone else enters the room.
1232.content:
"urgh...my head...what..happe..."

tidus was cut off in mid sentence by the sight in front of him...

he was....TINY!!!...just a couple of inches in height...yuna's boot was the size of a building compared to him

he gulped...hoping that Yuna Would at least see him...she was a white mage maybe she could turn him back to normal

a loud "ahem" brought him to his sense's..as he look up he saw wrapped in the finest cloth the biggest breasts he could imagine..they would put lulu's to shame!!!

as his head raised ever so slowly up...he locked eye with the collosal Yuna look down at him

"YUNA YUNA YOU HAVE TO HELP ME!!!" tidus shouted....but to yuna all she heard was a slight squeak

Yuna raised one finger to her mouth...pondering what she should do?
1232.title: the HIGH summoner...

12322.content:
She picks Up tidus lifting him to her ear.
"What happened to you?" she asked.
"Not so loud! my ears are tiny here!" yelled Tidus
"Sorry" she said quietly, "what happened to you?"
"It's Rikku! she used some kind of odd machine on me!"
"What? Why did she do this?"
"For fun it seems, yeah really funny Rikku."
"i am sure she must have a reason."
"i think you are just too nice Yuna, where is she anyway?"
"i didn't see her today, but i can help you find her"
"Thanks Yuna, in this size i would be crushed in seconds"
"I have to find a safe place for you..."
12322.title: She picks Up tidus lifting him to her ear

151.content:
(originally added by MrXD)


Yuna had recently discovered she had shrink and grow power , her first was act was to shrink and stomp the life out of a man who was bothering her , wanting to get her to bed with him.

She utterly appreciated the feeling he had underneath her boots ...

She decided since this moment to do the same thing with any jerk male she could meet ...


A few days later , another man came next to her , while she was on a bridge taking a break from the long walk she had .

"hey , I just saw you a bit earlier and since this moment I knew I had to tell you how beautiful you are , and to ask you if you were interested if I invited you eat something ..."

She laughed in a gentle way and answered "Why I don't even know you ."

After a little discussion he managed to invite her , once the lunch was finished , he grabbed her at the waist and came closer to her in order to kiss her lips but she then put her index on it and pushed his head back .

Then a flash came out from her finger and the man started to shrink right away... He stared at her growing and growing while he was becoming tinier every second passing . "You really thought I would kiss you ? Who do you think you are ? " She grinned wickedly .
Her cute face became scarier than anything for him . “HELP !”
“Nobody is going to help you little man …” She said eager to play with her prey .
151.title: Yuna

1511.content:
You see Yuna taking off her boot, to reveal her petite slender toes. They were emanating a strong odor.

"Yuna, what, <cough, cough> what are you doing?"

Yuna tilted her head, and grinned, "you can kiss me, just not where you want! Kiss my tired summoner feet!"

Will you risk her wrath by refusing? You don't know what she'll do if you refuse!
1511.title: She began to remove her boot , tormenting him w...

choices: Yuna sucks the man into her mouth.
She spits him into her palm
1513.content:
(originally added by Ethin)


"You know, on second thought I think a small kiss wouldn't hurt. You know... Something for my new pet." Yuna smiled wickedly as she brought the man closer to her puckered lips. Even tho Yuna only said a kiss the man struggled and screamed in her hand as she brought him closer and closer. He could feel the warm breath from her nostrils washing over him.

Didn't take long for his screams to be muffled as Yuna pressed him into her soft lips. The man continued to struggle and fight to get away but Yuna had no intention on letting him go.

A smirk crossed her face as she got a mean idea. Yuna put more pressure on the man and slowly opened her mouth a little forcing his upper half into her mouth.

The man screamed as his face was forced into her moist tongue. She giggled slightly as she licked the poor mans upper half covering him in saliva. Yuna took her hand away from him and could slightly see his legs sticking out from her lips.

Her chuckles boomed inside her mouth as she tormented them man with her tongue.

After a while....
1513.title: Into the cave!

choices: Finds more people to shrink and take home.
15131.content:
Yuna smiled as she slurped the man into her mouth like a noodle. His struggles in her mouth stopped after she started tossing him from cheek to cheek covering him in her thick saliva. She could faintly hear his screams echo inside her moist mouth it made her chuckle.

The laughter almost burst the mans eardrums as he soon stopped and slammed into the center of her tongue.

Yuna slightly opened her mouth letting light flood into the mans prison. He could see strings of saliva beading down from the roof of her mouth down to her tongue. The warm breath from behind him sent a chill down his spin..

Yuna smiled as she slowly tilted her head back and felt the man struggle down towards her throat. She moaned as his tiny body slipped down into it but she didn't swallow yet. She held him there enjoying his last struggles as saliva pooled up around him.. His cries for help sending shivers down her spin.

*GULP*

The mans last sight was the little light coming in through Yunas mouth and soon that went black as her esophagus grabbed hold of him and pulled him down.

Yuna could feel his struggles move down thru her body. She moaned as she rubbed her throat and soon felt the man fall into her dark humid stomach.

"Mmm.. You felt amazing slipping down my throat little bug... Hope you love my stomach. Cause it's going to be the last thing you see." Yuna laughed as she felt him pounding on her stomach walls.

Yuna smiles and....
15131.title: A mans last sight

151312.content:
Yuna felt like laying down on her bed at home and listen to the struggles.

"Don't go boiling away on me, now! At least not until I can focus on your pain!" She smiled as the struggling in her stomach was renewed.
151312.title: More options.

info.description:
this interactive is currently new and in progress so all contributions are welcome thank you


Welcome

this interactive story will revolve around the girls of final fantasy 10 or 10-2 having "fun" becoming giantess's OR shrinking one/multiple males

theres a ff7 gts story...and ff12...and now its time for the girls of FFX to have their own interactive story

i will add to this as much as i can

OOC/cruel/evil giantess behaviour is encouraged ;)

ANYTHING GOES...except scat toilet..other than that go crazy!!!!

please keep the story going as long as you can...oh and keep the one sentence chapters to a minimum k?
